title.rendered: 5 Steps to Getting More Retainer Clients

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573234300878{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Plus lots of tips on how to make it easier

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1508903685019{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Agencies know that retainer-based relationships provide dependable cash flow and company growth. Uncover some of the secrets behind building successful, ongoing relationships with clients – including leveraging marketing automation.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”In this issue of Agency Perspectives, you will:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1508903697763{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide”]

  • Explore the many benefits of retainer-based business
  • Get tips on how to approach client relationships
  • Learn how to identify which clients are a good fit for your agency

[/vc_column_text]

Paul Bresenden

454 Creative

``Client relationships are like dating relationships. If a mutually beneficial connection is made, it’s important to build a foundation of clear communication, trust, and willingness to look out for the best interest of the other party. At some point, the marker of a great relationship is ongoing commitment.``

What is Agency Perspectives?
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1516169342745{padding-right: 5em !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”]Agency Perspectives lets you hear directly from other agencies about how they are using marketing automation to create higher value relationships, build monthly recurring revenue, and prove value to clients. It’s available exclusively from SharpSpring. Contact us if you’d like to share your expertise as an author.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]
